sections.heading: business, defined.Ongoing business shall mean one which for at least six months previous to the sale:(1) Has been operated from a specific given location;(2) Has been open for business to the general public; and(3) Has had all equipment and supplies necessary for operating the business located at th
sections.text: business, defined.Ongoing business shall mean one which for at least six months previous to the sale:(1) Has been operated from a specific given location;(2) Has been open for business to the general public; and(3) Has had all equipment and supplies necessary for operating the business located at the specific given location.SourceLaws 1979, LB 180, ยง 14.
